kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

test.name: As a user, I want to signup successfully with valid data

kw.name: When user signup to FIT WAY platform with ${signup_email} and ${signup_name} and ${signup_lastname} and ${signup_phone} and ${signup_password}
kw.source_name: user signup to FIT WAY platform with ${signup_email} and ${signup_name} and ${signup_lastname} and ${signup_phone} and ${signup_password}

kw.name: Wait until element is ready then click element
Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//a[text()="สมัครสมาชิก"]'.
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.arg: xpath=//a[text()="สมัครสมาชิก"]

kw.name: Wait until element is ready then input text
Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//button[@type="submit" and text()="สมัครสมาชิก"]'.

kw.name: Then FIT WAY should display message as "สมัครสมาชิกสำเร็จ!"
kw.source_name: FIT WAY should display message as "${expected_message}"

kw.name: Wait until page contains element then verify text
Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Page should have contained text 'สมัครสมาชิกสำเร็จ!' but did not.
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.
kw.status: Page should have contained text 'สมัครสมาชิกสำเร็จ!' but did not.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'สมัครสมาชิกสำเร็จ!'.
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.
Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
